sentences.en: 71 percent of the entire budget went towards the military.
sentences.cn: 整个预算的71%用于了军备。

sentences.en: An entire poor section of town was bombed into oblivion.
sentences.cn: 城市的一整片贫民区被炸为了平地。

sentences.en: Have you drunk the entire bottle?
Here, graphically displayed, was confirmation of the entire story.
sentences.cn: 通过这里形象的展示证实了整件事的真实性。

sentences.en: If the Commission has its way, the entire deal will be scuppered.
sentences.cn: 如果委员会我行我素的话，整个交易将化为泡影。

sentences.en: In his long career at BP, Horton turned around two entire divisions.
sentences.cn: 霍顿在英国石油公司漫长的职业生涯中曾经让两个部门整体上起死回生。

sentences.en: It was the worst day in my entire life.
sentences.cn: 那是我一生中最糟糕的一天。

sentences.en: Latest reports say that mud slides buried entire villages.
sentences.cn: 最新报道说泥石流掩埋了整个整个的村庄。

sentences.en: One dip into the bottle should do an entire nail.
sentences.cn: 往瓶子里蘸一下的量就应该能涂满整个指甲。

sentences.en: Saivonsac shot the entire film with a hand-held camera.
sentences.cn: 塞冯萨克使用便携式摄像机拍摄了整部影片。

sentences.en: Soon the entire armed forces were in open revolt.
sentences.cn: 很快，整个武装部队开始公然抗命。

sentences.en: The entire memo took up all of two pages.
sentences.cn: 整个备忘录写了满满两页纸。

sentences.en: The entire pile shifted and slid, thumping onto the floor.
sentences.cn: 那整整一摞东西动了一下后滑落下来，嘭的一声全掉到了地上。

sentences.en: The entire world must take notice of something like this.
sentences.cn: 全世界一定要关注这样的事情。

sentences.en: They are willing to sign away their entire worldly possessions.
sentences.cn: 他们愿意签字放弃所有财产。

sentences.en: They feared that totalitarians might yet conquer the entire world.
sentences.cn: 他们担心极权主义者会征服整个世界。

sentences.en: You can store your entire CD collection on the computer's hard drive.
sentences.cn: 你可以将收藏的全部CD保存在电脑硬盘上。

phrases.tran_cn: (邮票)附贴在信封(或明信片、邮件包装纸等)上的

trans.tran_en: used when you want to emphasize that you mean all of a group, period of time, amount etc
